title: Integrated Growth Design Workshop for Engineering Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering design principles and familiarity with graphic tools, including practical project experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in digital device-accessible environments, emphasizing experience-based learning and reflective thinking for in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Participants can articulate the thinking process connecting practical experience and engineering theory with over 80% clarity through three reflective journaling sessions
Participants can develop design solutions applying at least two engineering tools to specific cases through PBL (Project-Based Learning) projects
Participants can analyze their professional development stages and establish improvement plans through peer feedback and instructor evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
